description: This file defines the interface for the WelcomeWidget class, which is a QWidget-based component used likely as a splash or welcome screen in a Qt application. It declares a constructor and includes guards to prevent multiple inclusion.

classes.name: WelcomeWidget
classes.description: A QWidget-derived class representing a welcome or splash widget in a Qt application. It provides a constructor for initializing the widget.

methods.name: WelcomeWidget
methods.description: Constructor for WelcomeWidget, optionally accepting a parent QWidget pointer.
